## Conclusions
* All of the four countries have a positive progress in vaccination.
* COVID-19 cases reached a peak in January 2021.
* China has the least cases among the countries.
* China has the most vaccinations among the countries.
* Asia owns the most cases and vaccinations in the world.
* Africa's vaccination progress is concerning.
